title: Wts: T206 donnie bush nm! Only $300

posts.post_title: Wts: T206 donnie bush nm! Only $300
posts.post_content: Amazing red color! Extremely sharp corners, sweet cap 350 back. Very, very slight diamond cut on the top of the card, nothing at all distracting. This card is absolutely beautiful! Detailed scans available, just send me your email. Card measures out completely. Thanks!
